00054  * @brief Destructor
00055  */
00056 CNFamilialReporter::~CNFamilialReporter()
00057 {
00058   m_iInstanceCount--;
00059   if (m_iInstanceCount == 0) {
00060     m_vParams.clear();
00061   }
00062 }

00079 /**
00080  * @brief Setup the reporter to be run
00081  * @param BaseEngine& - The engine associated with this reporter
00082  * @param CNCychp& - The Index's cychp data
00083  * @param CNCychp& - The Mother's cychp data
00084  * @param CNCychp& - The Father's cychp data
00085  * @param AffxArray<CNFamilialAnalysisMethod>& - The analysis methods to extract data from
00086  */
00087 void CNFamilialReporter::setup(BaseEngine& engine, CNCychp& cychpIndex, CNCychp& cychpMother, CNCychp& cychpFather, AffxArray<CNFamilialAnalysisMethod>& vMethods)
00088 {
00089   m_pEngine = &engine;
00090   m_pcychpIndex = &cychpIndex;
00091   m_pcychpMother = &cychpMother;
00092   m_pcychpFather = &cychpFather;
00093 
00094   m_pvMethods = &vMethods;
00095 }

00110 /**
00111  * Return SelfDoc option associated with a specified name.
00112  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc options to search.
00113  * @param const std::string& - The specified name to search for.
00114  * @return SelfDoc::Opt* - The SelfDoc option pointer or NULL if not found.
00115  */
00116 SelfDoc::Opt* CNFamilialReporter::getSelfDocOpt(std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts, const std::string& strName)
00117 {
00118   for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < opts.size()); iIndex++) {
00119     if (opts[iIndex].name == strName) {
00120       return &opts[iIndex];
00121     }
00122   }
00123   return NULL;
00124 }
00125 
00126 /**
00127  * Setup a bool parameter for this analysis method.
00128  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00129  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00130  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00131  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00132  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00133  * @return bool - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00134  */
00135 bool CNFamilialReporter::setupBoolParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string, std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00136 {
00137   SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00138   if (popt == NULL) {
00139     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));
00140   }
00141   bool b = AffxByteArray(popt->defaultVal).parsebool();
00142   fillInValue(b, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00143   std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00144   affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00145   param.SetName(wstr);
00146   param.SetValueInt8(b);
00147   m_vParams.push_back(param);
00148   return b;
00149 }
00150 
00151 /**
00152  * Setup an int parameter for this analysis method, including min amd max validation.
00153  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00154  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00155  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00156  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00157  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00158  * @return int - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00159  */
00160 int CNFamilialReporter::setupIntParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string, std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00161 {
00162   SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00163   if (popt == NULL) {
00164     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));
00165   }
00166   int i = ::getInt(popt->defaultVal);
00167   fillInValue(i, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00168   if ((popt->minVal != "NA") && (popt->minVal != "") && (i < ::getInt(popt->minVal))) {
00169     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " below minimum value of " + popt->minVal));
00170   }
00171   if ((popt->maxVal != "NA") && (popt->maxVal != "") && (i > ::getInt(popt->maxVal))) {
00172     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " above maximum value of " + popt->maxVal));
00173   }
00174   std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00175   affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00176   param.SetName(wstr);
00177   param.SetValueInt32(i);
00178   m_vParams.push_back(param);
00179   return i;
00180 }
00181 
00182 /**
00183  * Setup a float parameter for this analysis method, including min amd max validation.
00184  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00185  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00186  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00187  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00188  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00189  * @return float - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00190  */
00191 float CNFamilialReporter::setupFloatParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string, std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00192 {
00193   SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00194   if (popt == NULL) {
00195     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));
00196   }
00197   float f = (float)::getDouble(popt->defaultVal);
00198   fillInValue(f, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00199   if ((popt->minVal != "NA") && (popt->minVal != "") && (f < (float)::getDouble(popt->minVal))) {
00200     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " below minimum value of " + popt->minVal));
00201   }
00202   if ((popt->maxVal != "NA") && (popt->maxVal != "") && (f > (float)::getDouble(popt->maxVal))) {
00203     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " above maximum value of " + popt->maxVal));
00204   }
00205   std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00206   affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00207   param.SetName(wstr);
00208   param.SetValueFloat(f);
00209   m_vParams.push_back(param);
00210   return f;
00211 }

00213 /**
00214  * Setup a string parameter for this analysis method, including min amd max validation.
00215  * @param const std::string& - The name of the parameter
00216  * @param const std::string& - The prefix to use when setting up the header
00217  * @param std::map<std::string,std::string>& - A map of parameters to fill in
00218  * @param SelfDoc& - The SelfDoc object needed by the fillInValue function
00219  * @param std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& - The SelfDoc option to setup.
00220  * @return std::string - The value of the parameter as setup by this function.
00221  */
00222 std::string CNFamilialReporter::setupStringParameter(const std::string& strName, const std::string& strPrefix, std::map<std::string, std::string>& params, SelfDoc& doc, std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt>& opts)
00223 {
00224   SelfDoc::Opt* popt = getSelfDocOpt(opts, strName);
00225   if (popt == NULL) {
00226     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt not found: " + strName));
00227   }
00228   std::string str = popt->defaultVal;
00229   fillInValue(str, std::string(strName), params, doc);
00230   if ((popt->minVal != "") && (str < popt->minVal)) {
00231     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " below minimum value of " + popt->minVal));
00232   }
00233   if ((popt->maxVal != "") && (str > popt->maxVal)) {
00234     throw(Except("SelfDoc::Opt " + strName + " above maximum value of " + popt->maxVal));
00235   }
00236   std::wstring wstr = affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strPrefix + strName);
00237   affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType param;
00238   param.SetName(wstr);
00239   param.SetValueAscii(str);
00240   m_vParams.push_back(param);
00241   return str;
00242 }
00243 
00244 /**
00245  * @brief Return the analysis associated with the specified name
00246  * @param const AffxString& - The specified name
00247  * @return CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* - The associated analysis pointer
00248  */
00249 CNFamilialAnalysisMethod* CNFamilialReporter::getAnalysis(const AffxString& strName)
00250 {
00251   for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < (int)m_pvMethods->size()); iIndex++) {
00252     if (m_pvMethods->at(iIndex)->getName() == strName) {
00253       return m_pvMethods->at(iIndex);
00254     }
00255   }
00256   return NULL;
00257 }
00258 
00259 void CNFamilialReporter::loadParam(const AffxString& strName, PgOpt::PgOptType type, const AffxString& strValue, affymetrix_calvin_parameter::ParameterNameValueType& param)
00260 {
00261   param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strName));
00262   switch (type) {
00263   case PgOpt::BOOL_OPT: param.SetValueInt8(((strValue == "true") ? (char)1 : (char)0)); break;
00264   case PgOpt::DOUBLE_OPT: param.SetValueFloat((float)::getDouble(strValue)); break;
00265   case PgOpt::INT_OPT: param.SetValueInt32(::getInt(strValue)); break;
00266   case PgOpt::STRING_OPT:
00267     if ((strName.indexOf("command-line") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("analysis") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("program-cvs-id") != -1) || (strName.indexOf("version-to-report") != -1) || (strName.endsWith("-dir"))) {
00268       param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(strValue));
00269     } else {
00270       param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(Fs::basename(strValue)));
00271     }
00272     break;
00273   default: throw(Except("Cannot find PgOpt type for: " + strName));
00274   }
00275 }
